attributes.action: Abolish tax charged on pensioners incomes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many pensioners have made provisions for their old age only to find they are taxed higher than when they were working. Many find they would have been better off not saving for their old age - the Pension Credit system is a complete farce......

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
